page.title: 15CURRENT TOPICS(CONTINUED)
page.content: {WELCOME BACK} - July 1st 1985 The 39 America hijack hostages held captive by the Shi'ite gunmen in Lebanon for 17 days were welcomed to freedom today in Frankfurt(W.Germany) by the American Vice President Mr Bush. Mr Reagan, the American President, said, "We must continue our efforts to gain the release of the other 7 hostages held in Beirut" {WIMBLEDON 1985 }- July 1985 Virginia Wade,the 1978 Ladies Wimbledon Champion, will be playing her 85th Singles match in the opening game on the Centre Court against Pam Shriver. Miss Wade has played in 24 Wimbledons since 1962 and has won 63 matches and lost 22. If she is beaten it will be her final appearance at Wimbledon in the singles although she hopes to continue to play in the ladies and mixed doubles.
